heroes.name: Alkin
heroes.trait: Gorgons - Increases the Attack and Defense skills of any Gorgons or Mighty Gorgons for each level attained after 5th level

heroes.name: Broghild
heroes.trait: Wyverns - Increases the Attack and Defense skills of any Wyverns or Wyvern Monarchs for each level attained after 6th level

heroes.name: Bron
heroes.trait: Basilisks - Increases the Attack and Defense skills of any Basilisks or Greater Basilisks for each level attained after 4th level

heroes.name: Drakon
heroes.trait: Gnolls - Increases the Attack and Defense skills of any Gnolls or Gnoll Marauders for each level attained after 1st level

heroes.name: Gerwulf
heroes.trait: Ballista - Increases the Attack and Defense skill of any Ballista for each level attained after 4th level

heroes.name: Korbac
heroes.trait: Serpent Flies - Increases the Attack and Defense skills of any Serpent or Dragon Flies for each level attained after 3rd level

heroes.name: Tazar
heroes.trait: Armorer - Receives a 5% per level bonus to Armorer skill percentage

heroes.name: Wystan
heroes.trait: Lizardmen - Increases the Attack and Defense skills of any Lizardmen or Lizard Warriors for each level attained after 2nd level

heroes.name: Andra
heroes.trait: Intelligence - Receives a 5% per level bonus to Intelligence skill percentage

heroes.name: Merist
heroes.trait: Stone Skin - Casts Stone Skin with increased effect, based on hero level compared to the level of the target unit (the bonus is greater when used on weaker units)

heroes.name: Mirlanda
heroes.trait: Weakness - Casts Weakness with increased effect, based on hero level compared to the level of the target unit (the bonus is greater when used on weaker units)

heroes.name: Rosic
heroes.trait: Mysticism - Receives a 5% per level bonus to Mysticism skill percentage

heroes.name: Styg
heroes.trait: Sorcery - Receives a 5% per level bonus to Sorcery skill percentage

heroes.name: Tiva
heroes.trait: Eagle Eye - Receives a 5% per level bonus to Eagle Eye skill percentage

heroes.name: Verdish
heroes.trait: First Aid - Receives a 5% per level bonus to First Aid skill

heroes.name: Voy
heroes.trait: Navigation - Receives a 5% per level bonus to Navigation skill percentage
